setwd("C:/Users/Mike/Desktop/20160729_GeneticManagementTools/")
wfile <- read.csv("Example_Pedigree.csv", header=TRUE, stringsAsFactors=FALSE, na.strings="", check.names=FALSE)
sb <- qc.Studbook(wfile)
sb["population"] <- TRUE
p <- sb
p["ped.num"] <- findPedigreeNumber(p$id, p$sire, p$dam)
p["gen"] <- findGeneration(p$id, p$sire, p$dam)
gv <- reportGV(p, gu.iter=201, gu.thresh=2)
candidates <- c("1112", "846", "1025", "1038", "1042")
kmat <- gv$kinship
ped <- p
threshold <- 0.015625
ignore=list(c("F", "F"))
min.age=1
iter=10
numGp=2
updateProgress=NULL
